article_html: Would you check in to Víctor Enrich’s shapeshifting hotel? Using 3D-image wizardry, the Spanish photographer and sometime piano player has made Munich’s NH Deutscher Kaiser Hotel dance in 88 mindbending ways – one for each of his beloved instrument’s keys
text: Would you check in to Víctor Enrich’s shapeshifting hotel? Using 3D-image wizardry, the Spanish photographer and sometime piano player has made Munich’s NH Deutscher Kaiser Hotel dance in 88 mindbending ways – one for each of his beloved instrument’s keys
title: The incredible folding, exploding hotel – in pictures
